title: Survey for Men's Deodorants
selftext:
[https://forms.gle/e66BuHojm62odxX67](https://forms.gle/e66BuHojm62odxX67)

Please fill this survey for men's deodorants for a project.
comments:
Deodorants suck, antiperspirant and washing with benzoyl peroxide is better. My ex coworker uses engage. She smells like wet dog and engage.

Sorry, just wanted to rant.
I use roll on. No spray based deos
